title: My screen resolution is broken
body:
So I played a game earlier today, took a break but left my client open and when I went to play another game, my resolution was suddenly at 1024x768. My normal resolution is 1920x1080. I can change it to 1600x1200 at max but it always defaults back to 1024x768 whenever a new game starts. I have tried repairing my client and I have tried uninstalling and reinstalling and I also found a thread from 2 years ago showing how to change the resolution in C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config\game.cfg but none of that fixes it. 
I have no idea what else I can try to fix it, so any suggestions would be helpful, thanks

replies.body:
What graphics card do you have? Have you tried updating your graphics drivers for them?

If you're not too sure, do you know how to do a dxdiag?
Just as mysteriously as it broke, it mysteriously fixed itself. I don't know what I did, but it's fine now
So, even though you could only max at 1600x1200 instead of 1920x1080?
